Package suga.engine.game

Class BasicGame

java.lang.Object
suga.engine.game.BasicGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game
public class BasicGame extends Object implements Game
Games require a main game loop to run along with game components that need to be run every game cycle.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected List<AIAgent>
    agents
    A list of AIAgents that should have their logic run every cycle.

    panel
    The graphics panel that should be used to register draw listeners to.
    protected PhysicsEngine
    physics
    The physics engine that will be used with this game.
    protected Map<String,Scene>
    scenes
    A Map of scenes indexed by name.
    protected SugaThread
    thread
    The thread that is currently running this Game.

  • Field Details

    • objects

      protected Map<String,GameObject> objects
      A list of game objects for this game. Their logic should be called every cycle.

    • physics

      protected PhysicsEngine physics
      The physics engine that will be used with this game.

    • agents

      protected List<AIAgent> agents
      A list of AIAgents that should have their logic run every cycle.

    • scenes

      protected Map<String,Scene> scenes
      A Map of scenes indexed by name.

    • loadedScene

      protected Scene loadedScene
      The currently loaded scene object.

    • panel

      protected GraphicsPanel panel
      The graphics panel that should be used to register draw listeners to.

    • keyListener

      protected GameKeyListener keyListener
      The key listener that is being used by this game.

    • mouseListener

      protected GameMouseListener mouseListener
      The mouse listener that is being used by this game.

    • thread

      protected SugaThread thread
      The thread that is currently running this Game. May be null in some cases.

  • Constructor Details

    • BasicGame

      public BasicGame()
      Creates a new game without a given panel and game input listeners. These should be set with setters before calling loop().

    • BasicGame

      public BasicGame(GraphicsPanel panel, GameKeyListener listener, BasicMouseListener mouseListener)
      Creates a new game with the given panel used to register GameObjects as draw listeners to.
      Parameters:
      panel - The panel that GameObjects should register as a listener to.
      listener - The game key listener being used by this game object.
      mouseListener - The mouse listener being using by this game object.

    • getThread

      public final SugaThread getThread()
      Accessor method for the thread that is calling loop(). This can be used to determine whether the game has stopped or paused.
      Specified by:
      getThread in interface Game
      Returns:
      The thread that is running this game instance.

    • loop

      public void loop()
      The main logic loop for the game. Will be called depending on the rate of the logic thread.
      Specified by:
      loop in interface Game

    • processInput

      Processes inputs given by players. Is run during pause.

    • addDrawingListener

      public void addDrawingListener(DrawListener listener)
      Registers a new DrawingListener. This will not register anything beyond the draw method. Usually used by UI, hence the name.
      Specified by:
      addDrawingListener in interface Game
      Parameters:
      listener - The draw listener that should be registered to this panel.

    • clear

      Clears all AIAgents, physics managers, GameObjects, and PanelListeners.
      Specified by:
      clear in interface Game

    • loadScene

      public boolean loadScene(String name)
      Attempts to load the given scene. If successful with return true, if un-found or loading fails, will return false.
      Specified by:
      loadScene in interface Game
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the scene to attempt loading.
      Returns:
      True on a successful scene load.
